markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Raging Athlete](/Feats.aspx?ID=141) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 89 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Physical obstacles can't hold back your fury. While you are raging, you gain a climb Speed and swim Speed equal to your land Speed and the DC of [High Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) and [Long Jumps](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) decreases by 10. Your distance for a vertical [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) increases to 5 feet vertically, and your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet and to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.
name: Raging Athlete

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Raging Athlete Source Core Rulebook pg. 89 4.0 Prerequisites Expert in Athletics --- Physical obstacles can't hold back your fury. While you are raging, you gain a climb Speed and swim Speed equal to your land Speed and the DC of High Jumps and Long Jumps decreases by 10. Your distance for a vertical Leap increases to 5 feet vertically, and your distance for a horizontal Leap increases to 15 feet if your Speed is at least 15 feet and to 20 feet if your Speed is at least 30 feet.
